metadata.title: Web3 Learning Journey
metadata.description: A systematic Web3 learning path, from beginner to expert

hero.title: Learn
hero.description: From blockchain fundamentals to full-stack DApp development, follow a structured learning path to master Web3 skills

features.title: Why Choose This Learning Path
features.subtitle: A Web3 transition guide designed for Web2 developers

structured.title: Structured Learning
structured.description: From basics to advanced, a progressive learning path ensuring a complete knowledge system

practical.title: Practice-Driven
practical.description: Hands-on projects at each stage, learn by doing to quickly master core skills

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Visual learning progress, clear understanding of learning status, maintaining motivation

community.title: Cutting-Edge Tech
community.description: Keep up with Web3 industry development, continuously updated with latest technologies and best practices

modules.title: Learning Modules Overview
modules.subtitle: Four stages to systematically master Web3 development

foundation.title: Foundation
foundation.description: Blockchain principles, Ethereum ecosystem, cryptography basics

development.title: Development
development.description: Solidity smart contracts, development toolchain, frontend integration

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: DeFi protocols, NFT development, Layer2 solutions

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: Begin your Web3 learning journey now, systematically master blockchain development skills

roadmap.title: Learning Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: A clear learning path to help you grow efficiently

phase1.title: Web3 Introduction
phase1.description: Build blockchain fundamentals, complete your first on-chain interaction

phase2.title: Smart Contract Development
phase2.description: Master Solidity programming, independently develop and deploy smart contracts

phase3.title: Full-Stack DApp Development
phase3.description: Frontend-backend integration, build complete decentralized applications

phase4.title: Professional Specialization
phase4.description: Choose a professional direction for in-depth learning, become a domain expert
phase4.milestone: Contribute to open source or launch independent product

erc20.title: ERC-20 Token
erc20.description: Create your first ERC-20 token contract

voting.title: Voting Contract
voting.description: Implement a simple on-chain voting system

nftMint.title: NFT Mint Page
nftMint.description: Build an NFT minting frontend page

blockchainBasics.title: Blockchain Basics
blockchainBasics.description: Understand core blockchain concepts, including distributed systems, consensus mechanisms, and cryptography

topics.distributedSystemsDesc: Learn the fundamentals of distributed system design
topics.consensusMechanismsDesc: PoW, PoS and other consensus algorithms compared
topics.cryptographyBasicsDesc: Public key cryptography, digital signatures and core concepts
topics.hashAlgorithmsDesc: SHA-256 and other hash functions explained
topics.merkleTreesDesc: Merkle tree structure and blockchain applications

ethereumFundamentals.title: Ethereum Fundamentals
ethereumFundamentals.description: Deep dive into Ethereum's workings, including EVM, Gas mechanism, and account model

topics.evmDesc: EVM architecture, instruction set, and execution model
topics.accountModelDesc: EOA vs contract accounts and their interactions

web3Ecosystem.title: Web3 Ecosystem Overview
web3Ecosystem.description: Explore the Web3 ecosystem including DeFi, NFT, DAO, and Layer2

topics.defiOverviewDesc: Core concepts and major protocols in decentralized finance
topics.nftOverviewDesc: NFT technical standards and use cases
topics.layer2OverviewDesc: Ethereum scaling solutions classification and comparison

solidityProgramming.title: Solidity Programming
solidityProgramming.description: Master Solidity language and learn core smart contract development skills

topics.syntaxBasicsDesc: Solidity basic syntax and programming paradigms
topics.dataTypesDesc: Value types, reference types, and mappings
topics.functionsDesc: Function modifiers, visibility, and special functions
topics.eventsErrorsDesc: Event logging and custom error handling

contractSecurity.title: Contract Security
contractSecurity.description: Learn smart contract security best practices and prevent common vulnerabilities

topics.overflowDesc: Integer overflow issues and SafeMath usage
topics.auditToolsDesc: Slither, Mythril and other security analysis tools

devToolchain.title: Development Toolchain
devToolchain.description: Master modern smart contract development tools to improve efficiency

topics.foundryDesc: Foundry installation, usage, and testing framework
topics.remixDesc: Online IDE tips and debugging features
topics.testingDesc: Unit testing, integration testing, and fuzz testing

frontendIntegration.title: Frontend Integration
frontendIntegration.description: Learn DApp frontend development and implement Web3 application interfaces

topics.walletConnectionDesc: Multi-wallet support and connection state management

defiDevelopment.title: DeFi Protocol Development
defiDevelopment.description: Deep dive into DeFi protocol design and implementation

nftDevelopment.title: NFT Development
nftDevelopment.description: Learn NFT standards and marketplace development

layer2Development.title: Layer2 Development
layer2Development.description: Learn Layer2 solution development and deployment

contractUpgrades.title: Contract Upgrades
contractUpgrades.description: Master smart contract upgrade patterns and best practices

topics.upgradeSafetyDesc: Storage layout and upgrade safety checks

mevArbitrage.title: MEV & Arbitrage
mevArbitrage.description: Understand MEV mechanisms and protection strategies

crosschainDevelopment.title: Cross-chain Development
crosschainDevelopment.description: Learn cross-chain communication and asset bridging

zkApplications.title: ZK Application Development
zkApplications.description: Introduction to zero-knowledge proof application development

topics.zkUseCasesDesc: ZK applications in privacy and scaling

auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

notes.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action cannot be undone.
notes.loginToNote: Login to save your learning notes

ai.title: AI Learning Assistant
ai.subtitle: Web3 Expert Q&A
ai.welcome: Hello! I'm your Web3 learning assistant
ai.welcomeDesc: I can help you with questions about blockchain, smart contracts, DeFi, NFT, and other Web3 topics
ai.error: An error occurred, please try again

codeReview.title: Smart Code Audit
codeReview.subtitle: AI-powered contract security analysis
codeReview.noResults: Paste your code and click "Start Review" to see analysis results

certificate.title: NFT Certificates
certificate.subtitle: Mint your learning achievements as on-chain credentials
certificate.connectToMint: Connect your wallet to mint NFT certificates
certificate.loginRequiredDesc: Login to view and mint your learning certificates
certificate.whatIsNftCertDesc: NFT certificates are learning achievement credentials stored on the blockchain - immutable, permanent, and verifiable by anyone.
certificate.howToMintDesc: After completing the required learning content, connect your wallet (like MetaMask) and click the mint button to store your certificate on-chain.
